name: Creekside Creep Invasion
description: Stop the bogus creeps in this hardcore action roguelite! Equip rad perk based armor in five slots, wear and unlock new gnarly costumes with active and passive abilities, use tubular randomized guns, unlock tons of new ammo types and upgrade your awesome mini-mart!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb Storage: 500 MB available space
